articles.title: NASA astronauts clash with Russian cosmonauts on ISS: 'We are not the bad guys!' - Express
articles.description: CONFLICTS arising from Russia's invasion of Ukraine are beginning to spill over onto space, with tensions growing between NASA astronauts and Russian cosmonauts on board the ISS.
